# f5distributedcloud_protocol_policer (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_protocol_policer` resource manages Protocol Policers in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Protocol Policers define rate limiting policies for specific protocols.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_protocol_policer" "example" {
  name              = "http-policer"
  namespace         = "my-namespace"
  protocol          = "HTTP"
  requests_per_unit = 1000
  unit              = "SECOND"
  burst_size        = 100
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `protocol` (String) Protocol to police (HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, UDP).
- `requests_per_unit` (Number) Number of requests allowed per time unit.
- `unit` (String) Time unit for rate limiting (SECOND, MINUTE).

### Optional

- `burst_size` (Number) Burst size above the rate limit.
- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
